jcr:root.buttonText: Know more contributions that Huawei makes to construct a green world.
jcr:root.contentText: Used cell phones that are carelessly discarded or improperly processed may cause serious environmental problems and jeopardize your health and safety. To give a new life to used cell phones, promote resource recycling and protect the environment,Huawei will recycle your used cell phones for free to help construct a green world.
jcr:root.title: Huawei will always be with you to construct a green world! We will make it possible!
